text_block_list.text:
――A few days later. The day that Sakura Laurel 
would run in a selection race had arrived.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Laurel. 
How unexpected. You're participating.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Hishi Ama-chan, I was looking forward to today♪ 
I plan on winning against Hishi Ama-chan!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, you've said it now. Are your legs fine? 
Either way, bring it on!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Mumumu, so her opponent is Hishi Ama-san. 
She'll be quite the foe……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
That's true…… If it becomes battle of endurance, 
it doesn't look like she'll have a chance……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yes…… Just like you saw before, Laurel-san's running 
places a huge burden on her legs. And because of that……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
If she goes past her limits, she won't be able to last. 
Against someone like Hishi Ama-san, who could keep up 
with that Brian-san, an endurance battle is……

That opponent from her previous match had also come to watch. 
――Narita Brian.

She probably came to observe but, it was likely that―― 
she didn't even notice Sakura Laurel.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(So Brian-chan……came to watch…… 
I want to show her my run……!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(I've done all I can to prepare. But, to win decisively 
against Hishi Ama-chan, I'll need one more push……)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Eh……is it……raining? 
I did think the clouds looked a little dark but……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, looks like things will be a bit troublesome. 
The clouds are really thin so it should stop soon but……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
When the turf is wet, the ground gets slippery. 
Laurel, you should be careful too.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I'll be――just fine♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
After all, my running is a little unusual. When you're soaring 
through the skies, it doesn't matter what the ground is like♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Laurel……? That's right, your form is……

――It was a sliver of hope. If the turf was wet, 
then it would be difficult to get traction……

On the other hand, for Sakura Laurel, since she 
has more vertical force in her running style……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Well then, in the Selection race―― 
I'm looking forward to it Hishi Ama-chan!

And so, in that light shower…… 
Sakura Laurel began her Selection race to chase her dream.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Tch, it really is slippery. 
But this won't be enough to break me!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Showing determination in any situation, that's me, 
Hishi Ama Nee-san! Deiyaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
A-as expected of Hishi Ama-san! 
She can still run like that with these course conditions……

It seemed like the battle was already over. 
However――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Taaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Whaaaat!? Laurel!? 
What's with this speed……?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You're this unaffected by these conditions!? 
No, it's not just this. This running style……!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(Right, this is what it looks like when I run seriously, 
Hishi Ama-chan. And also――Brian-chan!!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(This run, I want to show it to someone who's 
chasing the same dream as me! If I win, then……! 
Just a little more, just a little more……!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Laureeeeeel!!!!! 
I won't lose!

――The race result. Hishi Amazon was first. 
And――

Sakura Laurel was unable to finish. 
As the rain stopped……so did Sakura Laurel……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Fuu-, how unfortunate. This is……my limit. 
I see, with my legs like this, even finishing is……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san…… Yes, I stopped because it seemed like 
I was at my limit. Pushing myself now, and being 
unable to chase after my important dream, won't do.

Her running, and even her stopping, was all 
for her dream. It seemed like Sakura Laurel 
was weighed down by thinking about her legs.

It was finally an opportunity to run with all her might. 
Just what was the dream that she wanted to fulfill that 
would make her hold herself back like this?
choice_data_list: Sakura Laurel, what is your dream……?
Sakura Laurel, what is your dream……?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Eh, what's my――dream?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I really want to know
Yeah, I really want to know

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. 
As lackluster as I am, if you're willing to listen.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: My dream is……Look, over there.
The direction she was pointing――was at Narita Brian.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: No, my dream is――further beyond that.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I was able to……see it today. Fufuu.

Beyond Narita Brian. 
There was――
A rainbow……
――A rainbow after the rain had stopped.
